verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In Your presence that's where I am strong, in Your presence O Lord My God
In Your presence that's where I belong, seeking Your face, touching Your grace
In the cleft of the Rock, in Your presence O God!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I want to go where the rivers cannot overflow me
Where my feet are on the Rock
I want to hide where the blazing fires cannot burn me
In Your presence O God!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I want to hide where the flood of evil cannot reach me
Where I'm covered by the Blood
I want to be where the schemes of darkness
Cannot touch me, in Your presence O God!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are my firm foundation, I trust in You all day long
I am Your child and Your servant and
You are my strength and my song, You're my song
